fixes.name: Accounts Above Threshold
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF to DAX IF. Replaced parameter reference [Parameters].[Balance Threshold] with SELECTEDVALUE('Balance Threshold'[Display As]) per parameter mapping rules. Updated column references to use 'accounts+'[ColumnName] format. Returns AccountID when CurrentBalance meets or exceeds the selected threshold; otherwise returns BLANK().
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
